scenario_text.value: He’s gone... This can’t be happening, right?
I couldn’t stop him! I... I couldn’t...
Garurumon? Hang on. Where are you going?
Make no mistake. I haven’t forgiven you yet.

I did help you, but that had more to do with
my disgust for the clown boy over there.

I don’t know what’s next. Maybe my jaws will
find your throat if we meet again.

My heart is still confused.
I can’t be anywhere near you yet.
I’m going. Don’t try and stop me.

Takuma, Agumon, you better be all right.
Otherwise I’ll...

This isn’t a goodbye, right? They’ll both be
back any moment now, right?

Enough with the jokes. They’re not dying...
They have to come back. Agumon! Takumaaa!

What’s going on? How could Takuma and Agumon
just disappear?

No way... You can’t just go like that.
Get back here, Agumon! You too, Takuma!

I can’t believe that they would just go like
this. I refuse to believe it!

This can’t be... This can’t be happening...
*sob*... Takuma! Agumon!
